featured.text: E. Eddie My childhood memory of a polar bear pacing back and forth in a very small space in a zoo keeps haunting me.
V2V works by using wireless signals to send information back and forth between cars about their location, speed and direction, so that they keep safe distances from each other.

definition.zh_def: 向前，向外；在某個方向上移動或發展。
definition.en_def: Outward or forward in place or time.
definition.example: She stepped forth to speak her mind.
